serviceData.title: Comprehensive Roofing and Restoration Solutions in your area
serviceData.p: We provide end-to-end roofing and restoration services for homeowners, property managers, and commercial clients. Our certified crews handle shingle, metal, and flat roofing systems, plus exterior restoration after storms, fires, or water damage. Every job includes a thorough inspection, a clear written estimate, and help with insurance claims when needed.

lists.title: Residential Roof Repair
lists.shortDescription: Targeted repairs for leaks, missing shingles, flashing issues, and localized storm damage on single-family and multi-family homes.
lists.description:
• Scope: Leak repair, shingle replacement, flashing repair, and minor deck patching

  • Benefits:

    • Fast response to stop active leaks and prevent interior damage

    • Cost-effective repairs extend the life of your existing roof

    • Work performed by certified roofing technicians with manufacturer-approved materials
lists.h2: What Is Residential Roof Repair in your area
lists.p2: Residential roof repair addresses localized problems like leaks, storm-damaged shingles, loose flashing, vent boot replacement, and minor decking repairs. Our technicians perform a detailed inspection, diagnose the cause (wind uplift, hail, wear, or poor flashing), and recommend repair or replacement options. We prioritize stopping water intrusion quickly and using materials that match your existing roof.
lists.tyesHeading: When Do You Need a Residential Roof Repair?
lists.overViewContent:
• Not Covered in Minor Repairs:

    • Full roof replacements (unless recommended)

    • Major structural repairs or full deck replacement

    • Asbestos abatement (we will coordinate specialists when required)

What's Included:

  • Detailed roof inspection with photographic documentation

  • Targeted shingle replacement, flashing repair, and leak sealing

  • Cleanup and disposal of materials

Typical Repair Sizes:
Single leak spot to areas up to 3 squares (approx. 300 sq ft)
Most residential repairs completed in 1 day

leftSection.title: Full Roof Replacement
leftSection.description: When repairs aren't enough: complete tear-off and replacement with new shingles, metal, or premium systems, including underlayment and ventilation upgrades.

rightSection.title: How to Choose Repair vs Replacement
rightSection.description: We evaluate age, remaining shingle life, number of leaks, and roof deck condition. If multiple similar issues exist across the roof or shingles are beyond expected lifespan, we’ll recommend replacement with transparent options.

lists.comapreHeading: What Is Included in a Residential Roof Repair?
allowedItems: Shingle replacement and matching where possible
Flashing repair around chimneys, vents, and skylights
Replacement of rotted soffit/fascia when limited and safe
prohibitedItems: Full structural deck replacement (major framing repairs)
Interior drywall repair unrelated to active roof access
Hazardous material abatement (asbestos, lead-based materials) — subcontracted if necessary
Permanent solutions when extensive water damage requires full replacement
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for Residential Roof Repair:
idealProjects: Fixing active leaks and flashing failures
Replacing isolated units of wind- or hail-damaged shingles
Repairing roof penetrations like vents and skylights
Addressing minor water stains and stopping further damage

lists.title: Commercial Roof Replacement
lists.shortDescription: Full replacement and re-roofing for flat and low-slope commercial buildings using TPO, EPDM, PVC, modified bitumen, and metal systems.
lists.description:
• Systems: TPO, EPDM, PVC, modified bitumen, built-up roofing, and metal

  • Benefits:

    • Commercial-grade materials with long-term warranties

    • Efficient project management to minimize business disruption

lists.h2: Commercial Roofing Solutions for Any Project in your area
lists.p2: Our commercial roofing services include single-ply membrane installations, hot and cold-applied systems, metal edge and coping replacement, rooftop equipment curbing, and scheduled maintenance programs. We coordinate tenant notices, phased work, and safety plans to keep your business operating during a re-roof.
lists.tyesHeading: Why Choose Our Commercial Roofing Services?
lists.p3: Licensed and insured commercial crews | Certified installers for major roof systems | Project scheduling to reduce downtime | Long-term material and workmanship warranties
lists.seoContent:
Trusted Commercial Roof Replacement Services in your area

From small retail buildings to large warehouses, Aqua Roofing And Restoration installs durable commercial roofing systems built to perform. We offer free roof surveys, energy-saving options, and insurance claim support. Call us at [phone] to request a commercial roofing proposal today.
lists.overViewContent:
• Not Included:

    • Hazardous-material remediation beyond scope (we coordinate specialists)

    • Interior tenant improvements unrelated to roof work

    • Structural work requiring a licensed structural engineer (we can coordinate evaluations)

What's Included:

  • Full site safety and fall protection plan

  • Tear-off or overlay as specified, membrane installation, flashing, and perimeter metal

  • Debris haul-away and proper disposal; final roof inspection and warranty paperwork

Typical Project Sizes:
From 1,000 sq ft up to multi-building campus projects
Project timeline and staging customized to the client's operations

leftSection.title: Emergency Tarping & Board-Up
leftSection.description: Immediate protection to stop interior damage until permanent repairs or replacement are completed.

rightSection.title: Choosing the Right Roof System
rightSection.description: We evaluate building use, budget, life-cycle costs, and energy goals to recommend TPO, EPDM, PVC, modified bitumen, or metal roof systems.

lists.comapreHeading: What Is Included in a Commercial Roof Replacement?
allowedItems: Complete membrane installation and perimeter flashing
New curb and penetration flashing for rooftop equipment
Insulation replacement and improved thermal performance
prohibitedItems: Major structural framing replacement (requires separate engineering scope)
Asbestos abatement (handled by certified abatement contractors)
Tenant interior retrofits unrelated to the roof project
Long-term HVAC replacement unless contracted as part of the project
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for a Commercial Roof Replacement:
idealProjects: Leaky low-slope roofs with multiple repairs over time
Reroofing for energy upgrades with new insulation
Multi-building campus reroofs with coordinated staging
Replacing failed flashings and perimeter systems

lists.title: Storm & Hail Damage Restoration
lists.shortDescription: Complete restoration after wind, hail, or storm events including emergency tarping, insurance documentation, and full roof replacement when required.
lists.description:
• Services: Emergency protection, hail repair, wind damage repair, insurance claim support

  • Benefits:

    • Rapid emergency response to prevent interior water damage

    • Experienced with insurance adjusters and claims documentation

    • Full restoration or targeted repairs depending on scope
lists.h2: Reliable Storm Restoration Services in your area
lists.p2: After a storm, quick action can prevent secondary damage. We provide emergency tarping, board-up, debris removal, hail and wind damage assessment, and full replacement when needed. Our team documents damage with photos and detailed estimates to support insurance claims and expedite the recovery process.
lists.tyesHeading: Events That Benefit from Our Storm Restoration Services
lists.p3: Hailstorms and wind events | Severe thunderstorms and microbursts | Fallen-tree impact repairs | Post-storm insurance claims and negotiated replacements
lists.seoContent:
Storm & Hail Damage Restoration Services in your area

If your property suffered hail, wind, or storm damage, Aqua Roofing And Restoration offers emergency protection and full restoration services. We assist with insurance claims and provide proven repair and replacement solutions. Call us at [phone] for a rapid response and free storm damage inspection.
lists.overViewContent:
• Not Covered:

    • Interior flood damage unrelated to roof failure (may be handled as separate restoration scope)

    • Pre-existing conditions not caused by the current storm

    • Acts of vandalism unless covered by insurance

What's Included:

  • Emergency tarping and temporary protection

  • Comprehensive damage report and insurance estimate support

  • Complete repair or replacement with cleanup and final inspection

Assessment Metrics:
Damage measured in squares (1 square = 100 sq ft) with photographic documentation for claims
Rapid emergency response typically within 24 hours

leftSection.title: Roof Inspection & Certifications
leftSection.description: Detailed inspection reports, shingle hail impact ratings, and certification letters to support insurance claims and code compliance.

rightSection.title: How to File an Insurance Claim
rightSection.description: We provide step-by-step assistance: damage documentation, itemized estimates, meeting the adjuster on-site, and working with your insurer to reach a fair settlement.

lists.comapreHeading: What Is Included in Storm & Hail Restoration?
allowedItems: Emergency tarping and board-up to prevent further water intrusion
Hail-damaged shingle replacement and full roof replacement when necessary
Gutter, soffit, and fascia repair or replacement caused by storm
Debris removal and site cleanup following restoration
Detailed documentation to support insurance claims
prohibitedItems: Flood remediation inside the home unrelated to roof breach
Cosmetic dents to siding or vehicles (we can recommend specialists)
Asbestos or hazardous-material abatement (handled by certified contractors)
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for Storm & Hail Restoration:
idealProjects: Wind-damaged roof edge and flashing repairs
Comprehensive exterior restoration following severe storms
